full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 112 of 261 1273
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 A. You mean the money for the therapy?
2 Q. Yes.
3 A. I think I paid back all of it.
4 Q. And that was $1,200?
5 A. I don't recall, but if you say so.
6 Q. You don't dispute that.
7 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
8 MS. STERNHEIM: I'll move on.
9 THE COURT: Okay.
10 Q. You're familiar with a man named Ray?
11 A. I know several people called Ray.
12 Q. Are you familiar with --
13 MS. STERNHEIM: May I have just a moment, Judge?
14 THE COURT: Yes.
15 Q. Are you familiar with a man - and I'm going to use a name, it's going to sound like a Broadway play - Alexander Hamilton?
16 A. No.
17 Q. Are you familiar with a man that goes by the name Ray Hamilton?
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. Ray Hamilton was a friend of yours, correct?
20 A. He was an acquaintance. He was a friend of a friend.
21 Q. He's someone that you knew both in the states as well as in London; correct?
22 A. No.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012863
